infos.name: bento-grid
infos.description: This challenge is perfect for testing your CSS Grid and responsive skills with this bento grid layout.

infos.name: conference-ticket-generator
infos.description: In this challenge, you'll create a form that generates a ticket. There's a lot of scope for customizing the generated ticket and putting your own stamp on the project.

infos.name: product-list-with-cart
infos.description: Practice updating the UI in multiple places based on user actions. The starter download also includes a JSON file to help you practice populating the DOM dynamically.

infos.name: tip-calculator-app
infos.description: This small app is perfect for anyone starting to get to grips with JavaScript. The calculator functionality will be a nice test!
